text.section:
In Anne Arundel County, the County Council may impose a direct tax levy on property within a shore erosion control district:
To repay a loan made to the county by the State for construction of a project for the benefit of the shore erosion control district under § 8-1005 of the Natural Resources Article; and
To pay for maintenance, repair, and reconstruction of shore erosion control works.

A tax levied under this section shall be levied and collected as county taxes are levied and collected, and shall have the same priority rights, bear the same interest and penalties, and in every respect be treated the same as county taxes.
